name: Pro Mahjong Kiwame Tengensenhen
overview: Pro Mahjong Kiwame Tengensenhen is a mahjong game and is the first game in the series released for the Playstation One console. The game features 16 different real mahjong players as opponents and the game mode is a 4 player vs mahjong. The game features 3 game modes: Professional, Gamble & Training.
